show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #53 Loren Poncia "Give Them What They Want"
subtitle: #53 Loren Poncia "Give Them What They Want"
summary:
This week Loren Poncia joins me from his beautiful Stemple Creek Ranch to talk about his journey to being a successful business man and running multiple stacked enterprises on the land that has been in his family over 100 years.

https://www.facebook.com/loren.poncia

https://stemplecreek.com/
